w:r.w:t: modern, professional, and credible corporate website
that reflects its position as a sustainable and forward-looking company.
Currently, content updates are dependent on technical resources, making changes slow and inefficient.
Inquiry handling is manual and not configurable
Improve engagement with customers, partners, and stakeholders
Enable non-technical teams to manage website content independently
Deliver a visually appealing, modern, and intuitive website
Provide a flexible CMS for full content control
Ensure inquiries are routed correctly and efficiently via email
Simple navigation (max 2–3 clicks to reach content)
SEO fields per page (meta title, meta description)
Content will be provided by Green Resources
CMS must be user-friendly for non-technical users
14. Future Enhancements (Out of Scope but Considered)
